Apple Scab Leaf.cause: Fungal infection caused by Venturia inaequalis.
Apple Scab Leaf.cure: Apply fungicides containing mancozeb or captan, and remove infected leaves.

Apple leaf.cause: This is a healthy apple leaf.

Apple rust leaf.cause: Fungal disease caused by Gymnosporangium species.
Apple rust leaf.cure: Remove nearby juniper plants and apply preventive fungicides.

Bell_pepper leaf spot.cure: Use copper-based fungicide and avoid overhead watering.

Bell_pepper leaf.cause: This is a healthy bell pepper leaf.

Blueberry leaf.cause: This is a healthy blueberry leaf.

Cherry leaf.cause: This is a healthy cherry leaf.

Corn Gray leaf spot.cure: Use resistant varieties and apply strobilurin fungicides.

Corn leaf blight.cause: Fungal disease caused by Bipolaris maydis.
Corn leaf blight.cure: Use fungicide and rotate crops annually.

Corn rust leaf.cure: Apply fungicides early in crop growth.

Peach leaf.cause: This is a healthy peach leaf.

Potato leaf early blight.cause: Fungal infection caused by Alternaria solani.

Potato leaf late blight.cure: Use systemic fungicides and destroy infected plants.

Potato leaf.cause: This is a healthy potato leaf.

Raspberry leaf.cause: This is a healthy raspberry leaf.

Soyabean leaf.cause: This is a healthy soybean leaf.

Soybean leaf.cause: Soybean rust caused by Phakopsora species.

Squash Powdery mildew leaf.cure: Apply sulfur spray or potassium bicarbonate.

Strawberry leaf.cause: This is a healthy strawberry leaf.

Tomato Early blight leaf.cure: Apply copper fungicide and remove damaged lower leaves.

Tomato Septoria leaf spot.cure: Use fungicides and improve air circulation.

Tomato leaf bacterial spot.cause: Bacterial pathogen Xanthomonas campestris pv. vesicatoria.
Tomato leaf bacterial spot.cure: Apply copper spray and use disease-free seeds.

Tomato leaf mosaic virus.cure: Remove infected plants and sanitize tools.

Tomato leaf yellow virus.cause: Tomato yellow leaf curl virus spread by whiteflies.

Tomato leaf.cause: This is a healthy tomato leaf.

Tomato mold leaf.cause: Gray mold caused by Botrytis cinerea.

Tomato two spotted spider mites leaf.cure: Use miticides or spray neem oil.

grape leaf black rot.cure: Apply fungicide and remove infected leaves.

grape leaf.cause: This is a healthy grape leaf.
